To try out ValidMind, you need to be a registered user on the ValidMind Platform. For early program access:

- [Pilot release](release-pilot.qmd)

## Prerequisites

## Developer framework

Testing out our sample Jupyter notebooks requires Python 3.8+.

## Validmind platform UI

You need to be able to access our ValidMind Platform UI in a modern browser such as Google Chrome. If you use a company VPC, we do support [AWS PrivateLink](configure-aws-privatelink.qmd).
